packagegui.name: squidreverseredir
packagegui.title: Reverse Proxy Server: Redirects

field.description: If checked, then this redirect will be available for reverse config.
Enter the name to identify this redirect in Squid reverse configuration. Example: REDIR1
Select the protocol to redirect on. Use CTRL + click to select multiple options.

Use Redirect row(s) below to match domains or regular expressions to redirect for (one per row).
Do NOT enter http:// or https:// - only the hostname is required.

Examples:
example.com
sub.example.com
www.example.com

Regular expressions examples:
(^|\.)example\.com$
^[^\.]*\.example\.*
.+\.www\.example\.com$
Select this check box if the fields below are a regular expressions, otherwise they are domains.

field.description: Enter the path regex to match here. Hint: Enter ^/$ to match the domain only.
